description:
Hamiko, the daughter with a history of serving the shogunate, has come to Gintoki and the bunch to ask them to do a job for her once again. Hamiko says that she`s completely quit "Paradise" because of the Harusame incident. But something terrible is happening to her boyfriend, Tasuke. Tasuke, a "Paradise" dealer, has decided to quit his organization and live an honest life with Hamuko. But when he learns the secret about "Paradise" not only can he not quit, but he is chased by Amanto from the organization as well…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für`s Glück spielt Status keine Rolle!
It`s Not Like I Line Up for Ramen. I Line Up for Satisfy Myself.
Ramen no Tame ni Narabunjanai. Jikomanzoku Tame ni Narabunda.
ラーメンのために並ぶんじゃない. 自己満足のために並ぶんだ / カワイイを連発する自分自身をカワイイと思ってんだろお前ら
